conversation.message: How'd things go with that one girl
Which girl are you talking about haha
You know.. the lean one with the braided back hair. I think she's Asian
Oh Jennifer? Haha idk Barbara
What do you mean idk haha
It's just that I think she's preoccupied
Like with another dude?
Yeah I think so. Sigh I missed my chance
Yeah, she used to come over and talk to me and stuff..but like I didn't pick up
Dammit Tonald step it up
Yeah and now im trying to hang out with her and its really hard everytime
You gotta chase after her if you really like her though
Hey why were you interested in my situation with Stephanie yesterday
haha idk
alright then
well sorry for not minding my own business I guess?

data.preview: well sorry for not minding my own business I guess?

conversation.message: Hey Anne whatsup!
Not much
Did you want to meet up and do something?
I'm down but I have to check my schedule haha
Okay no worries! Me and Steph wanted to catch a movie
Steph's gonna actually hang out with us? LOL
I know right!? She never hangs out with us anymore
Okay!I just found out I don't have to babysit tonight so I'm free
Sweet! What movie? Star Wars? La La Land? Split?
Haha I don't mind what we watch
Me neither haha. I'll ask Steph what she wants to see!
Okay haha
She wants to see La La Land haha I've heard good things about it
Yeah I'm down for it! Wanna grab dinner before at Chipotle?

data.preview: Yeah I'm down for it! Wanna grab dinner before at Chipotle?

conversation.message: Hey ken did you see the Warriors game last night?
Yeah.. kinda one sided
Yeah it kinda was but it was so dramatic to see KD in OKC again
Right?The entire building was booing him nonstop..
He still managed to put up 34 points holy crap
Dude is a straight beast haha he drained a 3 in Russel's face!
Yeah that was savage and that put the crowd to silence
Straight savage haha and they won by like what 15?
I think so haha
Did you go to class today
Yeah! Did you not come today? Your seat was empty
Yeah I was a little sick
Yeah you didn't miss too much but our midterm is next friday
Dang already? What's with this class moving so damn fast
Well haha we are on a quarter system
I know that
Hey Barbara its Ken the guy you met today!
Oh hey Ken! Whatsup?
Yeah I am haha
Same! What do you think of the class haha I think it's pretty chill
Yeah I think it's pretty chill too. It just kinda gets boring at times
Yeah I agree. You watch any shows or are you into any movies?
I'm into some shows. Like I watch Game of Thrones and some Netflix
That's cool. I'm really into crime shows like NCIS and stuff haha
Interesting
Haha yeah How'd you like to catch a movie this weekend?
Oh sure
Okay then haha
Actually I don't know about Friday night
Oh dang. Why not haha
I think I have plans that night with someone
Oh haaha don't worry about it we can catch a movie another time
I guess
We'll talk another time then haha bye

data.preview: We'll talk another time then haha bye
